Package payroll_processing_system

Class Management

java.lang.Object
payroll_processing_system.Employee
payroll_processing_system.Fulltime
payroll_processing_system.Management
public class Management
extends Fulltime
Management class is a child class of Fulltime and represents a Management Employee with additional instance variables roleName, roleCode, and additionalComp.
Author:
Hugo De Moraes, Jonathan Dong

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void calculatePayment()
    Overridden calculatePayment method calculates and sets the payment of Management employee sets payment as Salary/ number of pay periods plus additional compensation corresponding to roleCode

  • Constructor Details

    • Management

      Management​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String department, Date dateHired, double salary, int mgmtCode)
      Constructor for Managment object, creates Management employee with given name, department, date of Hire, salary, and roleCode.
      Parameters:
      name - name of Managment employee
      department - name of department
      dateHired - date of Hire of Management employee
      salary - salary of Management employee
      mgmtCode - roleCode of Management employee, 1 for Manager, 2 for Department Head and 3 for Director

  • Method Details

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overriden toString method converts a Management employee to a formatted String representation
      Overrides:
      toString in class Fulltime
      Returns:
      a formatted String containing name, date of hire, department, salary, and manager compensation

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
      Overriden equals method to determine if two Management Employees are equal
      Overrides:
      equals in class Fulltime
      Parameters:
      obj - Management Employee to be evaluated for equality
      Returns:
      true if two Management employees have equal profiles, salaries and roleCodes

    • calculatePayment

      public void calculatePayment()
      Overridden calculatePayment method calculates and sets the payment of Management employee sets payment as Salary/ number of pay periods plus additional compensation corresponding to roleCode
      Overrides:
      calculatePayment in class Fulltime
